thread.title: ‘2017 Is Saved’ — The Funniest Reactions to Beyoncé’s Pregnancy Announcement
thread.title_full: ‘2017 Is Saved’ — The Funniest Reactions to Beyoncé’s Pregnancy Announcement

author: Jame Jackson
title: ‘2017 Is Saved’ — The Funniest Reactions to Beyoncé’s Pregnancy Announcement
text:
When Beyoncé makes an announcement, we all listen. Queen Bey showed us just how much impact she has, when she took to Instagram to announce her latest pregnancy — with twins. 

While we knew that the Beyhive would go crazy over the news, the reactions to Beyoncé’s announcement have left us bowled over. For many, the Internet-crashing news may just, in fact, save 2017.
Now, there are many who are just relishing the moment:
2017 is saved!!!! @Beyonce is having twin 
— Vanessa Nelson (@Vanessa_MAFS) February 1, 2017 


I JUST SCREAMED IN A STRANGER’S FACE THAT BEYONCÉ IS PREGNANT WITH TWINS AND HE SAID NOTHING BACK
— Caity Weaver (@caityweaver) February 1, 2017 


Her Majesty #Beyonce is Pregnant #Beyonceispregnant #Bey #QueenBey #BowDown pic.twitter.com/sTQK2vR8qE 
— Educated Twink (@DatBoiGotCakes) February 1, 2017 


Many took the time to thank Beyoncé for her generosity to those of us in desperate need of a reason to smile:
Beyoncé sensed that we were all in need of good news, and so Beyoncé got pregnant with twins. Beyoncé is a woman of and for the people.
— Kelly Andersen (@kellyamedia) February 1, 2017 


It’s okay America. #Beyonce is pregnant with twins.
— Calum Worthy (@CalumWorthy) February 1, 2017 


The world is burning and Beyonce’s response is: MAKE TWO MORE BEYONCES
— KOBE BUFFALOMEAT (@edsbs) February 1, 2017 


Queen came through to give us new life in these dismal ass times. #Beyonce pic.twitter.com/FnKfH8HaCl 
— Janet Mock (@janetmock) February 1, 2017 


Everyone: 2017 is doomed
World: #BeyonceIsPregnant 
Beyonce: time to slay pic.twitter.com/gMT09pnBgk 
— ronregus smith (@RonnieRYANbryan) February 1, 2017 


Some couldn’t even articulate the words for such a momentous occasion:
BEYONCÉ’S PREGNANCY ANNOUNCEMENT GOT ME LIKE: pic.twitter.com/TG8k69aPUk 
— Your Queer Lil’ Sis (@blackampersand) February 1, 2017 


#BeyonceIsPregnant pic.twitter.com/1ibXgHHBuN 
— bey tá gravidaaaa (@AG_roby) February 1, 2017 


the internet and the #Beyhive right now with the #Beyonce pregnancy news pic.twitter.com/Zbyi5XMf8n 
— Lightskin Classic (@JCMedia787) February 1, 2017 


Others welcomed the news at the onset of Black History Month:
Bey: We gon tell em on the first of February.
Staff: But Bey it’s Black History Month.
Bey: These babies are black history. #Beyonce 
— DL.M (@SpeakDLM) February 1, 2017 


OH MY GOD BLACK HISTORY MONTH IS LIT
— Caity Weaver (@caityweaver) February 1, 2017 


Of course, many are wondering exactly what the Carter family plan to name the twins.
When we guessing the names? Here’s mine
Baby 1: Tidal
Baby 2: Exclusive
(Keep in mind they named their first born, Blue soooo….)
— Jozen (say Joe-Zen) (@jozenc) February 1, 2017 


Should she name them Yellow and Lemonade?
No? Okay.
*Nods and escorts self out*
— Issa Rae (@IssaRae) February 1, 2017 


If Bey has a boy and a girl she gotta name them Adam and Eve.
— Russ Bengtson (@russbengtson) February 1, 2017 


#Beyonce “Color+Plant” Baby Names:
Maroon Spruce,
Magenta Fireweed,
Kentucky Bluegrass,
Chantreuse Moth Orchid,
Bamboo.
— wahid (@WhdTKhn) February 1, 2017 


And then there are those who are using the moment to bring it back to what’s happening postelection.
Sad that there are more black people in Beyoncé right now, than in Trumps entire cabinet team.
— Gráinne Maguire (@GrainneMaguire) February 1, 2017 


BEYONCÉ’S TWINS FOR PRESIDENT 2056
— M Dizzle (@mmmandorf) February 1, 2017
